full_address: G03/2 Hazelbank Place, North Sydney, NSW 2060
listing_company_name: Johnson and Company Estate Agents - SYDNEY
description:
G.03/2 Hazelbank Place North Sydney A peaceful retreat on the fringe of North Sydney and Crow’s Nest, this one-bedroom apartment is very spacious and has the addition of a study area. This apartment is fully air conditioned and with high end details and a generous Zen courtyard. A superb choice for market newcomers or investors, it combines low maintenance luxury living and is strolling distance to cafes, restaurants, shopping, excellent transport (1.2Km to Oxley St Metro Station) and North Sydney CBD.

HIGHLIGHTS:
+Ground floor apartment in quality boutique secure building of only 15 with intercom
Separate bedroom with extensive walk-in wardrobes
+ Features integrated home office area
+ Open living space flows to private Zen style private courtyard
+ Integrated stone-topped kitchen featuring SMEG appliances
+ Spacious bathroom plus separate laundry with dryer/washer
+ Combined kitchen and lounge
+ High ceilings, timber floorboards, ducted r/c air con and bedroom ceiling fan
+ Secure parking area with Storage cage
+ Stroll to endless restaurants, supermarkets, cafes, Crows Nest eateries, buses, schools and Metro Stations coming soon

LOCAL FEATURES: WALKING
+ North Sydney Train Station: 14 min
+ City Bus Stop: 2min
+ Stanton Library: 5 min
+ Multiple cafes including Eighty Ate Caf&aecute;: 4 min
+ North Sydney Oval: 7min
+ Local parks: Nearby parks include Civic Centre Park, St Leonard's Park and Brennan Park.

SPACE: TOTAL 85 SQM on title 67Sqm Internal 17 Sqm Courtyard 1 Sqm Storage

INSPECT BY APPOINTMENT: Call Ashley Johnson 0429 274234
